posts.post_content:
Posted By: Zach Rice
This card is in extremely low grade. It has been trimmed, has back damage, and the layers are starting to seperate. Price is $45 DLVD. This is an affordable card from the 1800s that has major defects, but still has an excellant photo.

[IMG]http://i102.photobucket.com/albums/m84/mzm55cards/getn172.jpg[/IMG]

Posted By: Zach Rice
Sorry to say, but this card has been sold to Mr. Maines. Thanks to all for the inquries on it.
